name: Winds&Temples
description: The villagers ask you to support them in their fight against the evil samurai Toshimoto. Help them and go out into the world to banish Toshimoto! Travel skillfully with the winds, visit the four temples and bring the artifacts into your possession. But be careful, there are many dangers lurking on your way: you have to stand up to thieves and ghosts, wind dragons corner you and you have to acquire various items to brave all dangers. Wind & Temple is a two-dimensional board game in which you recreate the world you move through newly in each turn. Winde&Tempel has a unique movement concept based on the use of the four different colored winds: The squares you can enter depend on the color of the wind blowing in that direction. Therefore, choose your moves carefully if you want to make it to the end and free the villagers from Toshimoto's yoke.
